awd_titl_txt: Instrumentation for Advanced Laboratory Instruction in      Analytical Chemistry and Biochemistry
awd_abstract_narration: The effective training of undergraduates demands hands-on                       access to modern chromatography equipment.  Exposure to both                    liquid and gas chromatography techniques as well as stop flow                   sampling form the basis of this project.  Students in physical                  chemistry, analytical chemistry and biochemistry will benefit                   from the instrumentation.                                                                                                                                       This Instrumentation and Laboratory Improvement (ILI) award                     from the Chemical Instrumentation Program will help the                         Department of Chemistry at Bowling Green University to acquire                  chromatographic equipment that will be used to enhance                          undergraduate laboratory instruction.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
